channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Pope Leo XIV’s Creole heritage highlights complex history of racism and the church in America
item.description: The election of Pope Leo XIV, who is the first U.S. pope and has Creole roots, is raising more awareness about the complexity of the Creole identity.

item.title: Judge pauses much of Trump administration’s massive downsizing of federal agencies
The pope is on the line: AP is there for pontiff’s call to his brother in Chicago
